subtitle: If veal is difficult to get, use pork chops instead.

method.text: Put veal chops into a non-metallic shallow dish.Season. Add half the chopped sage, garlic and cider. Cover and chill for at least 1 days, or preferably overnight.
Drain chops from the marinade. Keep marinade.
Heat half the butter in a pan with the olive oil. Add veal chops and fry gently until sealed on both sides.
Add marinade; simmer gently for 20 - 25 min or until veal chops are just cooked.
Meanwhile, put mayonnaise, soured cream and mustard in a basin. Stand over a pan of gently simmering water and warm through. Add 2 tablespoons of cooking juices. Toss apple slices in lemon juice.
Heat remaining butter in a large shallow pan. Add drained apple slices and fry gently for about 3 min, turning to brown evenly.
Remove apple slices to a dish and keep warm. Add breadcrumbs and remaining sage to the butter left in the pan. Fry gently until golden.
Arrange cooked veal chops on a serving dish with the apple slices. Spoon over the prepared sauce. Sprinkle with fried breadcrumbs.

title: Veal with apple sauce
